revised_title: Extinct and Living Races of Gigantic Land-Tortoises: Aldabra Group and Mascarene Islands
tldr: Dr. Albert Günther describes the living and extinct races of gigantic land-tortoises, focusing on the Aldabra Group and Mascarene Islands. He discusses the challenges faced in conducting experiments in London and how relocating to Kew Gardens provided better conditions for his research. The study contributes to the understanding of the evolution and distribution of these species.
